title: New & MPFree: Mount Kimbie – Baves Chords
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/mountkimbie1.jpg "mountkimbie1")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/7135-new-mpfree-mount-kimbie-baves-chords/attachment/mountkimbie1)

With he dust unearthed by _Crooks & Lovers_ now settled, producer-duo **Mount Kimbie** are beginning to think about releasing new material. Their new _Carbonated EP_ is set to drop on June 27. Although the single clearly isn’t new, it does feature some remixes from the likes of **Airhead, Peter Van Hoesen,** and **Klaus** as well as the track _Baves Chords_ from way back in 2009. Check it out bellow.
